title: Baked rice with wild mushrooms and cheese
ingredients: ['20g (¾oz) dried porcini mushrooms', '600ml (1 pint) hot water', '25g (1oz) dry-pack sun-dried tomatoes', '1 tsp olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '185g (6½oz) long-grain brown rice', 'pepper to taste', '½ tsp dried sage', '60g (2¼oz) reduced-fat mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '2 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
